code: import{CELL_SIZE}from'./utils/utils';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SnakeBoard=_ref=>{let{snake,food,direction}=_ref;const renderBoard=()=>{let rows=[];for(let row=0;row<CELL_SIZE;row++){let cells=[];for(let col=0;col<CELL_SIZE;col++){let isSnake=snake.some(s=>s.x===col&&s.y===row);let isFood=food.x===col&&food.y===row;let isSnakeHead=snake[0].x===col&&snake[0].y===row;let className='boardBlock ';if(isSnake){className+='snake ';if(isSnakeHead){className+='snakeHead ';className+=direction;}}else if(isFood){className+='food ';}cells.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:className},"".concat(col,"-").concat(row)));}rows.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rows",children:cells},row));}return rows;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"snakeGameContents",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"board",style:{'--cell-size':"".concat(CELL_SIZE*40,"px")},children:renderBoard()})})});};export default SnakeBoard;
